get.description: Returns a list of your brands.
Returns a list of your leagues.
Returns a Bet Finder widget for a given player.

parameters.name: league
parameters.description: League slug.

parameters.name: player
parameters.description: Player name.

parameters.name: workspace
parameters.description: Workspace id. If not provided, the main workspace will be used.

parameters.name: sportsbooks
parameters.description: Sportsbook slugs.

parameters.name: bestodds
parameters.description: When enabled, the best odds will display by default among the sportsbooks selected.

parameters.name: average
parameters.description: When enabled, Average Lines will show for all bets if not available amount the sportsbooks selected.

parameters.name: deeplinks
parameters.description: When enabled, all buttons will use deeplinking when available.

parameters.name: bettypes
parameters.description: Select the bet types you want to display on the widget. Bet types will display based upon the entity selected.

parameters.name: embed
parameters.description: The embed format you want to return. Default type is HTML (recommended) and requires installation of our injector script.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Locale for localization (e.g., 'pt' for Portuguese, 'en' for English).

get.description: Returns a Bet Finder widget for a given team.

parameters.name: league
parameters.description: League slug.

parameters.name: team
parameters.description: Team name.

parameters.name: workspace
parameters.description: Workspace id. If not provided, the main workspace will be used.

parameters.name: sportsbooks
parameters.description: Sportsbook slugs.

parameters.name: bestodds
parameters.description: When enabled, the best odds will display by default among the sportsbooks selected.

parameters.name: average
parameters.description: When enabled, Average Lines will show for all bets if not available amount the sportsbooks selected.

parameters.name: deeplinks
parameters.description: When enabled, all buttons will use deeplinking when available.

parameters.name: bettypes
parameters.description: Select the bet types you want to display on the widget. Bet types will display based upon the entity selected.

parameters.name: embed
parameters.description: The embed format you want to return. Default type is HTML (recommended) and requires installation of our injector script.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Locale for localization (e.g., 'pt' for Portuguese, 'en' for English).

get.description: Returns a gamelines Odds Text widget for the specified teams and date.

parameters.name: league
parameters.description: League slug.

parameters.name: team1
parameters.description: Team name.

parameters.name: team2
parameters.description: Team name.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Matchup date (EST) in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: workspace
parameters.description: Workspace id. If not provided, the main workspace will be used.

parameters.name: sportsbooks
parameters.description: Sportsbook slugs.

parameters.name: bestodds
parameters.description: When enabled, the best available odds will display by default among the sportsbooks selected.

parameters.name: inlineodds
parameters.description: When enabled, the odds will display inline.

parameters.name: inlineline
parameters.description: When enabled, the line will display inline.

parameters.name: inlinelogo
parameters.description: Display player or team logos inline with text.

parameters.name: inlineoutcome
parameters.description: Display the outcome label or entity name in front of line/odds.

parameters.name: inlinebrand
parameters.description: Display sportsbook logos inline with text.

parameters.name: textonly
parameters.description: When enabled, the popover, call-to-actions, and links will be disabled.

parameters.name: embed
parameters.description: The embed format you want to return. Default type is HTML (recommended) and requires installation of our injector script.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Locale for localization (e.g., 'pt' for Portuguese, 'en' for English).

get.description: Returns a list of futures tile widgets for the specified player.

parameters.name: league
parameters.description: League slug.

parameters.name: player
parameters.description: Player name.

parameters.name: workspace
parameters.description: Workspace id. If not provided, the main workspace will be used.

parameters.name: inprogress
parameters.description: Include topics that are in progress.

parameters.name: variant
parameters.description:
Desired display variant: 
- sportsbook: Display odds for a single sportsbook. 
- best-odds: Display the best available odds for each market.

parameters.name: sportsbook
parameters.description: Sportsbook slug. Required if variant is sportsbook.

parameters.name: education
parameters.description: When enabled, educational text will display under each market.

parameters.name: noodds
parameters.description: When enabled, odds will be hidden from the display.

parameters.name: deeplinks
parameters.description: When enabled, all buttons will use deeplinking when available.

parameters.name: nolinks
parameters.description: When enabled, all link clicks are disabled.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: When enabled, the widget will display in a vertical format when displaying betting education and/or filtering on specific gamelines.

parameters.name: embed
parameters.description: This will return either an iframe or WordPress shortcode embed format as the output. By default, it will return iframe.

topic.name: AP Offensive Rookie of the Year
